title: The marginal distance on all sides shall be as per Table No
clause_text: The marginal distance on all sides shall be as per Table No.6-D / Table No.6-E for building height or floors mentioned therein. For height more than stipulated in Table No.6-D / Table No.6-E, the marginal distance on all sides, except the front side of a building, shall be minimum H / 5 (Where H = Height of the building above ground level).
section: Marginal distances for buildings of heights more than mentioned in Table No.6-D of Regulation No.6.2.1

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
